sentences.sContent: Her younger brother hovered in the background watching us.
sentences.sCn: 她的弟弟在后面走来走去，观察着我们。

sentences.sContent: flies hovering above the surface of the water
sentences.sCn: 盘旋在水面上方的苍蝇

trans.tranOther: to stay nervously in the same place, especially because you are waiting for something or are not certain what to do
